input_args.passage: "John Wick (character) - Wikipedia | He is the titular protagonist of the American media franchise John Wick. In the franchise's film series, he is introduced as a legendary Belarusian-American ex-hitman who left the criminal underworld after falling in love with and marrying a woman named Helen., titular protagonist of the American media franchise John Wick"
input_args.claim: 'However, both are part of a broader category of media franchises with strong narrative elements and characters, which could be broadly classified as storytelling genres.'
